backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining AC submission storage with Map-based persistence, public endpoints for submitting/retrieving AC data, and authentication checks using Internet Identity for admin routes.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files for the AC Buy application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with neutral, monochrome color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the AC Buy application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining routes for home, submit, success, pricing, contact, and admin pages, all wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/ACSubmissionForm: Form component with validation for collecting AC details (brand, model, age, condition) and customer contact info, submitting to backend via useACSubmission hook and navigating to success page.
frontend/src/components/ContactInfo.tsx: Card component displaying contact details (phone, email, address, business hours) with icons in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper with sticky header navigation, conditional Admin link for authenticated users, logout button, mobile menu, and footer with business info and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/PricingFactorCar: Reusable card component displaying pricing factors with icon (Lucide or image), title, and description with hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useACSubmission.ts: Custom hook managing AC submission state, calling backend submitAirConditioner via useActor, and handling loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and caching backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all submissions and individual submissions by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm earth-tone color palette for light and dark modes, defining CSS variables for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page requiring Internet Identity authentication to view and manage all customer AC purchase submissions in a sortable table format.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying company contact information, response time details, and FAQ section about the AC purchase process.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards highlighting service benefits, and how-it-works section for selling used air conditioners.
frontend/src/pages/PricingInfo.tsx: Pricing information page explaining factors that affect AC valuation (age, condition, brand, efficiency) with example price ranges and CTA to submit for quote.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccess.tsx: Success page displayed after AC submission, showing confirmation message, next steps information, and navigation buttons to return home or submit another AC.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitAC.tsx: AC submission page that displays a header, three benefit cards (Quick Response, No Obligation, Secure Process), and renders the ACSubmissionForm component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme with OKLCH color system, container settings, font families (Inter), custom shadows, and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a used AC purchase website with 13 implemented features including homepage, submission form, pricing display, admin dashboard, and currency conversion to Indian Rupees; notes admin dashboard lacks authentication.
